Package gobblin.data.management.copy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CopyableDataset
    Dataset that supports finding CopyEntitys.
    CopyableDatasetBase
    A common superinterface for Datasets that can be operated on by distcp.
    CopyableFileFilter
    A filter that is applied on all the CopyableFiles found by CopyableDataset.getCopyableFiles(FileSystem, CopyConfiguration).
    IterableCopyableDataset
    A CopyableDatasetBase that returns CopyEntitys as an iterator.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllEqualComparator<T>
    Implementation of Comparator where all elements are equal.
    CloseableFsCopySource
    Used instead of CopySource for FileSystems that need be closed after use E.g SftpLightWeightFileSystem.
    CopyableDatasetMetadata
    A CopyableDataset that is used to serialize into state objects.
    CopyableFile
    Abstraction for a file to copy from CopyableFile.origin to CopyableFile.destination.
    CopyableFile.Builder
    Builder for creating CopyableFiles.
    CopyableGlobDatasetFinder
    ConfigurableGlobDatasetFinder that returns datasets of type RecursiveCopyableDataset.N
    CopyConfiguration
    Configuration for Gobblin distcp jobs.
    CopyConfiguration.CopyConfigurationBuilder  
    CopyContext
    Context that can hold global objects required in a single copy job.
    CopyEntity
    Abstraction for a work unit for distcp.
    CopyEntity.DatasetAndPartition
    Uniquely identifies a fileSet by also including the dataset metadata.
    CopyResourcePool
    A ResourcePool for resources used in distcp: total bytes to copy, total number of CopyEntitys.
    CopySource
    Source that generates work units from CopyableDatasets.
    FileAwareInputStream
    A wrapper to InputStream that represents an entity to be copied.
    IterableCopyableDatasetImpl
    Wraps a CopyableDataset to produce an IterableCopyableDataset.
    OwnerAndPermission
    Wrapper for owner, group, and permission of a path.
    PreserveAttributes
    Configuration for preserving attributes in Gobblin distcp jobs.
    ReadyCopyableFileFilter
    A CopyableFileFilter that drops a CopyableFile if another file with "filename.ready" is not found on the sourceFs
    RecursiveCopyableDataset
    Implementation of CopyableDataset that creates a CopyableFile for every file that is a descendant if the root directory.
    RecursivePathFinder
    Used to find the path recursively from the root based on the PathFilter created in the Properties
    SubsetFilesCopyableDataset
    Implementation of CopyableDataset and FileSystemDataset that has an identifier in a root directory, and only contains a subset of files in the root directory.
    SubsetFilesCopyableDatasetFinder
    SubsetFilesCopyableDataset finder that extends ConfigurableGlobDatasetFinder.
    TimestampBasedCopyableDataset
    Implementation of CopyableDataset.
    TimestampBasedCopyableDataset.CopyableFileGenerator  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PreserveAttributes.Option
    Attributes that can be preserved.
